description:
"So what do you think?" I asked Liev.
"What do you mean?"
"What do you think of this guy?" I pointed to Phillip.
Liev got a bit grin on his face.
"He's fun. He's Russian. Russians are fun!"
Then they both said something in Russian that I think meant "brothers." But I don't know.
They started exploring each other's bodies and Liev was very direct...
"Oh I like this!" he said as he rubbed Phillip's furry abs. "This is fuzzy."
"You don't have any fuzz?" Phillip asked.
"No."
"No? Well you can have some today!"
The two of them had a great time together. Phillip, who says he is normally a top, was in heaven with Liev's dick inside him.
Afterward, Liev said, "I think this is the most chemistry I have had with someone... maybe you guys should pair me up with more Russians!"
title: Phillip & Liev: Bareback
